resources.string:
What is Unmute?\n
Unmute is a student-driven complaint and feedback app designed for the NMIMS Shirpur campus. It gives students a simple, direct platform to voice their concerns, report issues, and suggest improvements related to academic, hostel, mess, and overall campus life.
\nWhether itâ€™s a technical glitch, poor mess food, Wi-Fi issues, or even a suggestion like building a temple on campus, Unmute ensures your voice is heard by the right authorities.
\nThe goal is to create a more responsive, transparent, and connected environment where students feel empowered to speak up and actively participate in improving campus life.
